NextBot/BecomeRagdoll.description: Become a ragdoll and remove the entity.

NextBot/BodyMoveXY.description: Should only be called in BodyUpdate. This sets the move_x and move_y pose parameters of the bot to fit how they're currently moving, sets the animation speed to suit the ground speed and calls FrameAdvance.

NextBot/FindSpots.description: Returns a table of hiding spots.

NextBot/GetRangeSquaredTo.description: Returns the distance to an entity or position. It is supposed to return a squared distance, however.

NextBot/GetRangeTo.description: Returns the distance to an entity or position

NextBot/GetSolidMask.description: Returns the solid mask for given NextBot.

NextBot/HandleStuck.description: Called from Lua when the NPC is stuck. This should only be called from the behaviour coroutine - so if you want to override this function and do something special that yields - then go for it.

NextBot/MoveToPos.description: To be called in the behaviour coroutine only! Will yield until the bot has reached the goal or is stuck

NextBot/PlaySequenceAndWait.description: To be called in the behaviour coroutine only! Plays an animation sequence and waits for it to end before returning.

NextBot/SetSolidMask.description: Sets the solid mask for given NextBot.
